original_text: Draw me not away with the wicked, and with the workers of iniquity, which speak peace to their neighbours, but mischief is in their hearts.
korean_text: 악인과 악을 행하는 자들과 함께 나를 끌어내지 마옵소서 그들은 그 이웃에게 화평을 말하나 그들의 마음에는 악독이 있나이다

sentences.original_text: Draw me not away with the wicked
and with the workers of iniquity
which speak peace to their neighbours
but mischief is in their hearts
